attributes.action: Our Forces should be paid a tax free bonus of £2,000 per head for saving the Olympics paid for by G4S.
attributes.additional_details:
Once again our Armed Forces have stepped into the breach at short notice ensuring that this Olympiad will not be allowed to descend any further into farce.
They will not ask for or expect, any special treatment.
It is therefore incumbent on those who can to speak in their support.
I implore the Prime Minister and Secretary of State for Defence to ensure each serviceman and woman operationally deployed are shown the Nations gratitude by ensuring that the penalties levied against G4S include a tax free payment of £2,000 for each of them.
